row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE
row.description: Escapes quotes and adds quotes to argument values

row.process:
! We escape double-quotes for java Strings : SET &TEMP# = STR_SUB("TEMP_OPTION_VALUE", """", "\""")
! then we add double-quotes to String to preserve spaces in value : SET &TEMP# = STR_CAT(""" ", &TEMP#) : SET &TEMP# = STR_CAT(&TEMP#, " """)
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE# = &TEMP#
